@triton.jit
def softmax_kernel(
    input_ptr,
    output_ptr,
    n_channels,
    BLOCK_SIZE: tl.constexpr,
):
    row_idx = tl.program_id(0)
    row_start = row_idx * n_channels
    offsets = row_start + tl.arange(0, BLOCK_SIZE)
    mask = tl.arange(0, BLOCK_SIZE) < n_channels   # because the last row might not be full
    row = tl.load(input_ptr + offsets, mask=mask, other=-float('inf'))
    max_val = tl.max(row, axis=0)
    row_minus_max = row - max_val
    numerator = tl.exp(row_minus_max)
    denominator = tl.sum(numerator, axis=0)
    softmax_out = numerator / denominator
    tl.store(output_ptr + offsets, softmax_out, mask=mask)
